name: Bayer AG
goal:
Bayer is an innovation company with core competencies in the fields of health care and agriculture, developing new molecules for use in innovative products and solutions to improve the health of humans, animals and plants.

Bayer has 99,592 employees as of 31 Dec.2017. Bayer's business is managed by three divisions: Pharmaceuticals, Crop Science and Consumer Health.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Activities in the policy areas related to pharmaceutical, crop protection, seeds and animal heath legislations and regulations.

Bayer also follows policies in the area of trade, intellectual property, environmental protection, chemical policy, agricultural policy, digital policy, taxation, innovation and research, and pesticide regulations
